io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.module.kit

Interface NucleusKitService


  • public interface NucleusKitService
    A service for getting and setting kits.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Kit createKit(java.lang.String name)
      Gets a new kit object for use with the Kit service.

      If a Player is unable to redeem the given Kit as they have previously redeemed it and that the cooldown has not expired, will return the Instant the User may redeem the kit again.

      Returns the items for a kit that the target player would redeem (that is, with token replacements if applicable).

    • Method Detail

      • getKitNames

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getKitNames()
        Gets the names of all the kits currently in NucleusPlugin.
        Returns:
        A Set of Strings.

      • getKit

        java.util.Optional<Kit> getKit(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the requested kit if it exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the kit.
        Returns:
        An Optional that might contain the kit.

      • getItemsForPlayer

        java.util.Collection<org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack> getItemsForPlayer(Kit kit,
                                                                                       org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player)
        Returns the items for a kit that the target player would redeem (that is, with token replacements if applicable).
        Parameters:
        kit - The kit to process
        player - The player
        Returns:
        The items.

      • hasPreviouslyRedeemed

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> hasPreviouslyRedeemed(Kit kit,
                                                                                org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User player)
        Returns whether the given Kit has previously been redeemed by the Player.

        No assumptions about whether the kit may be redeemed again is made.

        Parameters:
        kit - The Kit
        player - The User
        Returns:
        Whether the kit has been redeemed before.

      • isRedeemable

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Boolean> isRedeemable(Kit kit,
                                                                       org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User player)
        Gets whether a Player can redeem the given Kit given any cooldown and one-time kit status
        Parameters:
        kit - The Kit
        player - The User
        Returns:
        true if so

      • getCooldownExpiry

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Optional<java.time.Instant>> getCooldownExpiry(Kit kit,
                                                                                                org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.User player)
        If a Player is unable to redeem the given Kit as they have previously redeemed it and that the cooldown has not expired, will return the Instant the User may redeem the kit again.
        Parameters:
        kit - The Kit
        player - The Player
        Returns:
        The Instant the cooldown expires, if there is a cooldown in effect.

      • redeemKit

        KitRedeemResult redeemKit(Kit kit,
                          org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                          boolean performChecks)
        Redeems a kit on a player. Whether the player must get all items is controlled by the Nucleus config.
        Parameters:
        kit - The kit to redeem
        player - The player to redeem the kit against
        performChecks - Whether to perform standard permission and cooldown checks
        Returns:
        The KitRedeemResult

      • redeemKit

        KitRedeemResult redeemKit(Kit kit,
                          org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player player,
                          boolean performChecks,
                          boolean mustRedeemAll)
        Redeems a kit on a player.
        Parameters:
        kit - The kit to redeem
        player - The player to redeem the kit against
        performChecks - Whether to perform standard permission and cooldown checks
        mustRedeemAll - Whether all items must be redeemed to count as a success
        Returns:
        The KitRedeemResult

      • removeKit

        boolean removeKit(java.lang.String kitName)
        Removes the requested kit.
        Parameters:
        kitName - The name of the kit to remove.
        Returns:
        true if a kit was removed.

      • renameKit

        void renameKit(java.lang.String kitName,
               java.lang.String newKitName)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Renames a kit.
        Parameters:
        kitName - The name of the kit to rename
        newKitName - The new name of the kit
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either the kit or the target name are unavailable

      • saveKit

        void saveKit(Kit kit)
        Saves a kit.
        Parameters:
        kit - The kit.

      • createKit

        Kit createKit(java.lang.String name)
       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets a new kit object for use with the Kit service.

        Do not make your own kit type, it will not get saved! Use this instead.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the kit to create
        Returns:
        The Kit
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the kit name already exists, or is invalid
